value.title: DAX Fridays! #182: Why your  Power BI tables sometimes filter, sometimes dont
value.excerpt: Why sometimes your tables filter each other and sometimes they dont? Understanding relationships: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-4ybWQSRcOY  Modeling playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDz00l_jz6zyfWLZIu8psvTESmKuVDUoG

value.title: DAX fridays! #19: DIVIDE
value.excerpt: Let's go through DIVIDE() function available in DAX!  The DIVIDE function performs divisions and returns alternate result or BLANK() on division by 0.It is faster than the simple division operator. value.title: DAX Fridays! #197: Why you need to test your DAX measures in different contexts
value.excerpt: Always, always, always test your DAX measures in different contexts (different filtering scenarios) to make sure your DAX measure is calculating correctly. value.title: DAX Fridays! #34: UNICHAR and REPT
value.excerpt: In todayâ€™s video I will show you  two new DAX functions: UNICHAR and REPT  UNICHAR DAX function allows you to display unicode symbols in Power BI and Excel.   REPT allows you to repeat text using DAX.  With both functions you can create a star rating visualization among other cool things.  Chris Web
